verses.verse: Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872>
"Speak <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and say <WH559> to them, <WH3068> 'I am Yahweh your God. <WH430>

You shall not do <WH6213> as they do <WH4639> in the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> where you lived: <WH3427> and you shall not do <WH6213> as they do <WH6213> in the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> where I am bringing <WH935> you; <WH3212> neither shall you walk in their statutes. <WH2708>
You shall do <WH6213> my ordinances, <WH4941> and you shall keep <WH8104> my statutes, <WH2708> and walk <WH3212> in them: <WH3068> I am Yahweh your God. <WH430>
You shall therefore keep <WH8104> my statutes <WH2708> and my ordinances; <WH4941> which <WH834> if a man <WH120> does, <WH6213> he shall live <WH2425> in them: <WH3068> I am Yahweh.
<WH7126>"'None of you shall approach anyone <WH376> who are his close <WH7607> relatives, <WH1320> to uncover <WH1540> their nakedness: <WH6172> I am Yahweh. <WH3068>

<WH1540>"'You shall not uncover the nakedness <WH6172> of your father, <WH1> nor the nakedness <WH6172> of your mother: <WH517> she is your mother. <WH517> You shall not uncover <WH1540> her nakedness. <WH6172>
<WH1540>"'You shall not uncover the nakedness <WH6172> of your father <WH1>'s wife: <WH802> it is your father <WH1>'s nakedness. <WH6172>

<WH1540>"'You shall not uncover the nakedness <WH6172> of your sister, <WH269> the daughter <WH1323> of your father, <WH1> or the daughter <WH1323> of your mother, <WH517> whether born <WH4138> at home, <WH1004> or born <WH4138> abroad. <WH2351>

<WH1540>"'You shall not uncover the nakedness <WH6172> of your son <WH1121>'s daughter, <WH1323> or of your daughter <WH1323>'s daughter, <WH1323> even their nakedness: <WH6172> for theirs <WH2007> is your own nakedness. <WH6172>
<WH1540>"'You shall not uncover the nakedness <WH6172> of your father <WH1>'s wife <WH802>'s daughter, <WH1323> conceived <WH4138> by your father, <WH1> since she is your sister. <WH269>
<WH1540>"'You shall not uncover the nakedness <WH6172> of your father <WH1>'s sister: <WH269> she is your father <WH1>'s near kinswoman. <WH7607>
<WH1540>"'You shall not uncover the nakedness <WH6172> of your mother <WH517>'s sister: <WH269> for she is your mother <WH517>'s near kinswoman. <WH7607>
<WH1540>"'You shall not uncover the nakedness <WH6172> of your father <WH1>'s brother, <WH251> you shall not approach <WH7126> his wife: <WH802> she is your aunt. <WH1733>
<WH1540>"'You shall not uncover the nakedness <WH6172> of your daughter-in <WH1121>-law: she is your son's wife. <WH802> You shall not uncover <WH1540> her nakedness. <WH6172>
<WH1540>"'You shall not uncover the nakedness <WH6172> of your brother <WH251>'s wife: <WH802> it is your brother <WH251>'s nakedness. <WH6172>

<WH1540>"'You shall not uncover the nakedness <WH6172> of a woman <WH802> and her daughter. <WH1323> You shall not take <WH3947> her son <WH1121>'s daughter, <WH1323> or her daughter <WH1323>'s daughter, <WH1323> to uncover <WH1540> her nakedness; <WH6172> they are near kinswomen: <WH7608> it is wickedness. <WH2154>
<WH3947>"'You shall not take a wife <WH802> to her sister, <WH269> to be a rival, <WH6887> to uncover <WH1540> her nakedness, <WH6172> while her sister is yet alive. <WH2416>
<WH7126>"'You shall not approach a woman <WH802> to uncover <WH1540> her nakedness, <WH6172> as long as she is impure <WH5079> by her uncleanness. <WH2932>
<WH5414>"'You shall not lie <WH7903> carnally <WH2233> with your neighbor <WH5997>'s wife, <WH802> and defile yourself with her. <WH2930>
<WH5414>"'You shall not give any of your children <WH2233> to sacrifice <WH5674> to Molech; <WH4432> neither shall you profane <WH2490> the name <WH8034> of your God: <WH430> I am Yahweh. <WH3068>
<WH7901>"'You shall not lie with a man, <WH2145> as with <WH4904> a woman. <WH802> That is detestable. <WH8441>

<WH5414>"'You shall not lie <WH7903> with any animal <WH929> to defile <WH2930> yourself with it; <WH802> neither shall any woman give <WH5975> herself <WH6440> to an animal, <WH929> to lie down <WH7250> with it: <WH8397> it is a perversion.
<WH2930>"'Don't defile yourselves in any of these things: <WH428> for in all these the nations <WH1471> which I am casting out <WH7971> before <WH6440> you were defiled. <WH2930>
The land <WH776> was defiled: <WH2930> therefore I punished <WH6485> its iniquity, <WH5771> and the land <WH776> vomited out <WH6958> her inhabitants. <WH3427>

You therefore shall keep <WH8104> my statutes <WH2708> and my ordinances, <WH4941> and shall not do <WH6213> any of these abominations; <WH8441> neither the native-born, <WH249> nor the stranger <WH1616> who lives as a foreigner <WH1616> among you; <WH8432>
(for all these <WH411> abominations <WH8441> have the men <WH582> of the land <WH776> done, <WH6213> that were before <WH6440> you, <WH776> and the land became defiled <WH2930>);
that the land <WH776> not vomit you out <WH6958> also, <WH2930> when you defile it, <WH6958> as it vomited out the nation <WH1471> that was before you. <WH6440>
<WH6213>"'For whoever shall do any of these abominations, <WH8441> even the souls <WH5315> that do <WH6213> them shall be cut off <WH3772> from among <WH7130> their people. <WH5971>

Therefore you shall keep <WH8104> my requirements, <WH4931> that you do not practice <WH6213> any of these abominable <WH8441> customs, <WH2708> which were practiced <WH6213> before <WH6440> you, <WH2930> and that you do not defile yourselves with them: <WH3068> I am Yahweh your God. <WH430>'"
